flawed_nl_solution:
Each tree produces 60*0.5=<<60*0.5=30>>30 more lemons than normal
So they each produce 60+30=<<60+30=90>>90 lemons
He has 50*30=<<50*30=1500>>1500 trees
So every year he produces 1500*90=<<1500*90=130500>>130500 lemons
That means he produces 130500*5=<<130500*5=652500>>652500
#### 652500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 135000, not 130500. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
